headline: 3M Co (MMM) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong EPS Growth Amidst Global Challenges
summary: 3M Co (MMM) reports a 12% increase in adjusted EPS and robust shareholder returns, despite facing macroeconomic and legal hurdles.

raw.headline: 3M Co (MMM) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong EPS Growth Amidst Global Challenges
raw.summary: 3M Co (MMM) reports a 12% increase in adjusted EPS and robust shareholder returns, despite facing macroeconomic and legal hurdles.

headline: MMM Q1 Deep Dive: Tariffs Loom Over Stable Operations and Product Launch Momentum
summary: Industrial conglomerate 3M (NYSE:MMM) reported Q2 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, but sales fell by 1.6% year on year to $6.16 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.16 per share was 7.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
